alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 14 at 5:18PM CDT until March 14 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in north central Texas... Southeastern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 517 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waxahachie, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Mesquite, Desoto, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Balch Springs, Ennis, Midlothian, Seagoville, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Hutchins, Sunnyvale, Wilmer, Ovilla, Ferris, Palmer, Combine, Oak Leaf and Pecan Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 394 and 413. Interstate 20 between mile markers 472 and 484. Interstate 45 between mile markers 257 and 276. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
